text:
If a code include apr_queue.h without including other apr header files first,
the header file won't define any function prototype as APR_HAS_THREADS is not
defined.
creator: henryjen@ztune.net
henryjen@ztune.net
text:
Created attachment 19085
move the #if to be after #include directives

By moving the #if directive, APR_HAS_THREADS will have correct value.
